channel.title: Coping Mechanisms on Baigel Bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Coping Mechanisms on Baigel Bytes

item.title: More mental and physical health tips from journeys past & present.
item.description: Introduction: Have you ever woken up from sleep with a sharp pain in your ear? One so sharp, so intense that you can’t even lift your head off the pillow without quietly (so as not to wake your flatmates) shreeking in pain. This is something that’s happend to me many times and continues to happen to me to this day. I’ll have to look into it sometime but for now I’m using it as part of the inspiration for this article.
